text: Aey eman walo! Allah Taalaa per uss kay rasool (PBUH) per aur uss kitab per jo uss ney apney rasool (PBUH) per utari hai aur unn kitabon per jo iss say pehlay uss ney nazil farmaee hain eman lao! Jo shaks Allah Taalaa say aur uss kay farishton say aur uss ki kitabon say aur uss kay rasoolon say aur qayamat kay din say kufur keray woh to boht baray door ki gumrahi mein jaa para
